title: Looking for the exact font used in LCD panels
content:
Just as many other people in this section of the forum I ask help from design experts. People! Please, HELP! I can’t find this font anywhere and feel like I’m going nuts!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406024853im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_6427.jpg)

This font is usually used in all kind of monitoring LCD panels and in particular in this one:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406024853im_/http:/typophile.com/files/adl-backlit_4544.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406024853im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MoTeC%20SDL%20Boost%20blk_4559.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406024853im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SDL_6056.jpg)

By the way, in the electronic _[PDF manual](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406024853/http:/www.motec.com/support/manuals/Manual%20ADL2%20A5.pdf)_ from that LCD panel there are _[illustrations of its front side](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406024853/http:/img165.imageshack.us/img165/6694/manualhd7.jpg)_ and in document properties of the manual is specified, that it has been created in Acrobat Distiller 5.0.5 (Windows). From this I can draw a conclusion that the given font exists (I **very** much hope), and has been used during creation of that PDF manual. There are many similar fonts and I have them, but replacement is unacceptable. This part:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406024853im_/http:/typophile.com/files/x_3710.jpg)

should be by all means displaced to the left. I.e. it would be very desirable full similarity to the original!

Guys, I really need it. Please, help me!
author: Anatoly

comments.content: The PDF manual contains no font - the illustrations are all graphics - no embedded LCD font. I too have several LCD fonts but none with the rounded corners you need.

Not the right one, but here is one with sort-of rounded corners:

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff\_readout\_two\_front/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406024853/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_readout_two_front/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff\_readout\_two\_front/")
